definition: camp/barracks/battalion/to build/to operate/to manage/to strive for
to raise (animals)/to bring up (children)/to keep (pets)/to support/to give birth

sentences.english: Over one third of all child deaths are linked to malnutrition.
sentences.chinese: 所有兒童死亡中三分之一以上與營養不良有關。

sentences.english: Some were covered in excrement, and many were suffering from malnutrition.
sentences.chinese: 一些人被糞便覆蓋，許多人營養不良。

sentences.english: Malnourished children are even more susceptible to being infected because of their weakened immune systems.
sentences.chinese: 營養不良的兒童因爲免役系統變弱甚至更容易被感染。

sentences.english: The four victims were found malnourished and suffering from bedsores.
sentences.chinese: 四名受害者被發現時，營養不良且長滿褥瘡。

sentences.english: The little girl was dwarfed by malnutrition(or under nutrition)。
sentences.chinese: 這小姑娘因營養不良而長不高。

sentences.english: Malnutrition is one of the common afflictions of the poor.
sentences.chinese: 營養不良是窮人的常見病痛之一。

sentences.english: Its childhood malnutrition rate is far lower than India's.
sentences.chinese: 它的兒童營養不良率遠低於印度。

sentences.english: Malnutrition is estimated to contribute to more than one third of all child deaths.
sentences.chinese: 據估計，營養不良造成所有兒童死亡的三分之一以上。

sentences.english: The effects of malnourishment are stark.
sentences.chinese: 營養不良導致的效應是明顯的。

sentences.english: But it might also be the case that the mother's smoking leads to a form of foetal malnutrition, " says Matz Larsson."
sentences.chinese: 但是它可能也是母親吸菸導致胎兒營養不良的原因。

sentences.english: Epidemiological research also found evidence of malnutrition in people with dementia.
sentences.chinese: 流行病學研究也發現失智症患者營養不良的證據。

sentences.english: Do not use if the edema is caused by malnutrition.
sentences.chinese: 因營養不良而致之虛腫慎用。

sentences.english: Reduce the number of children suffering from under-nutrition.
sentences.chinese: 減少兒童營養不良人數。

sentences.english: Malnutrition caused mainly because junk food.
sentences.chinese: 營養不良主要是因爲偏食造成的。

sentences.english: Increased access of malnourished children to health centres for treatment will be addressed.
sentences.chinese: 將解決營養不良兒童增加利用衛生中心進行治療問題。

definition: to put on weight/to get fat
imbalance/to become dysfunctional/to lack proper care (after an illness etc)
